Trash & Brush Pick-Up
=====================

Find out when trash, brush and bulk items get picked up in your neighborhood.

Trash Pickup schedule
---------------------

### South Side Residents Pickup Every Tuesday

### North Side Residents Pickup Every Thursday

* Trash carts must be set no later than 7:00 A.M. with CLOSED lid facing the street.
* Any carts that are **STUFFED** with an **OPEN LID**, facing the **WRONG WAY** or **NOT SET OUT** in time **WILL NOT** be serviced.

Bulk and Brush Pickup Schedule
------------------------------

* Bulk and Brush items can be placed at the curb UP TO 72 hours (Friday) prior to scheduled start of pick up week. Bulk and brush must be in separate piles. Piles must not exceed more than 6' x 6''.
* Construction debris, Concrete and Tires WILL NOT be picked up. It will be the RESIDENTS' responsibility to dispose of these.

### First Week of Every Month

Devilbliss  
Field  
Gregory  
Laguna  
New Rincon  
Oak  
Retama  
Reynolds  
Rincon  
Route 2  
San Patricio

W. Elm  
W. Escobedo  
W. Verbina  
W. Pecan  
Wilburn

Bulk and Brush items can be placed at the curb UP TO 72 hours (Friday) prior to scheduled start of pick up week. Bulk and brush must be in separate piles. Piles must not exceed more than 6′ x 6′.

Construction debris, Concrete and Tires WILL NOT be picked up. It will be the RESIDENTS’ responsibility to dispose of these.

Bulk items will be serviced by ABSOLUTE WASTE SERVICE, INC.  
Brush will be serviced by ABSOLUTE WASTE SERVICE, INC.

Bulk and Brush DROP OFF
-----------------------

### Bulk

The Collection station at 501 Industrial is open every Tuesday from 1:00 P.M. – 3:00 P.M. and the first Saturday of every month from 9:00 AM – 1:00 P.M.

Please come by City Hall on Tuesday with your loaded truck bed or trailer so it can be measured and fee charged (if necessary). Saturday drop offs will be measured and fee charged (if necessary) at collection station.

### Brush

Brush can be taken to the waste water plant off County Road 3561. It is open Monday – Friday 8:00 A.M. – 3:30 P.M. Closed 12:00 P.M. – 1:00 P.M. for lunch. Weather permitting.

Please stop by City Hall with loaded brush for a brush pass before heading out to site.

Stay connected! Community alerts & emergency notifications
----------------------------------------------------------
